RelatedSentence: KANEOHE , HAWAII -- Today , the Hawaii Republican Party ( HRP ) led by Pat Saiki and Miriam Hellreich , tripled down on neutrality , silence and inaction for another two years by retaining an official party platform and political strategy which is destined to keep Hawaii 's tiny minority party in the political wilderness of irrelevance through 2016 .
